text: William Garrat (born 21 April 1805) was an English professional cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1832 to 1845. A right-handed batsman who was mainly associated with Nottingham and Nottinghamshire, he made 32 known appearances in first-class matches.CricketArchive. Retrieved on 4 December 2008. He represented the Players in the Gentlemen v Players series and the North in the North v. South series. ==References== Category:1805 births Category:English cricketers Category:English cricketers of 1826 to 1863 Category:Players cricketers Category:Nottinghamshire cricketers Category:North v South cricketers Category:Year of death unknown Category:Nottingham Cricket Club cricketers Category:Fast v Slow cricketers
title: William Garrat
